QuestData.Title: The Mosh'Ogg Bounty
QuestData.Description: Say... have you heard about the ogres? I got a hot tip from some fella' named Mok'thardin that they're hiding some special, magical artifact in their cave. Skeezy knows better, though. I can smell money from a Mulgore mile away, and I'll bet that ogre doodad's worth a fortune.$b$bHere's a hint: I've seen them guarding a chest up in some ruins behind their mound. Care to fetch it for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Mosh'Ogg Bounty from the ruins behind the Mosh'Ogg Ogre Mound.
